EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_SG_Pivotal User Day_Q118.SG_User Day Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering! Confirmation of Registration for Pivotal Data& Analytics User Day on 21 March 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Data & Analytics User Day. We look forward to seeing you soon!
Event Details
Date & Time: 21 March 2018, 9:00 AM–2:00 PM {{my.SG Data User Day:default=edit me}} Location: Raffles City Convention Centre, 2 Stamford Road, Singapore 178882
Questions? Please email marketing-singapore@pivotal.io <[[mailto:marketing-singapore@pivotal.io]]>.
